value:
$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Dream-King Freyr!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Are you hurt?$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|...I regret this family squabble has
caused you so much trouble.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Let's return to Ljósálfheimr.
Then, Alfonse's world should
start returning to—$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|It is...already too late.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|What do you mean? What's
already too late?$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Freyja has placed a curse on me.
The necklace Brísingamen...$k$pWith it, one can take everything
from someone else and claim
it as one's own...$k$pFreyja has complete control over
my powers now.
I can do nothing to stop her.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|If that's true, then...even if we return
to Ljósálfheimr...$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Freyja now commands the power
of our combined strength. Dream and
reality both bend to her every whim.$k$pShe cannot be stopped...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|W-well, for now, let's get out of here
while we can! We have to get back
to Ljósálfheimr and—$k$p$Sbs2000|$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|Go back? I'm afraid that is no longer
an option for you.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|With my brother's power finally
as one with my own, dreams are
mine to command.$k$pNow, none can flee from our grasp.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Urrrgghh...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Mrgh... I can feel...Dream-King Freyr's
power, tight in Lady Freyja's grip...$k$pAll dreams are hers now... Within
the dream realms, no one can stand
against her. Not anymore...$k$p...How could you, Lady Freyja!$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|Go on. Try to stop me if you must.
But first you'll have to survive my
never-ending nightmare...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_08,0|$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|Pitiful mortals. How amusing.$k$pNo matter how many nightmares you
manage to defeat, I am above you...
Beyond you. Reality is mine to wield.$k$pRun. Run! But know this: There is no
escape for you. The nightmare will
always be right behind you.$k$p

$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|This way, everyone!
Just a little farther...$k$p$EFace_Pain|Ah! ...Th-this can't be!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|H-how could—$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The bridge to the other world
is gone... This must be because
of the nightmares...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We'll just have to keep trying.
There must be some other way...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|There is no other way.$k$pI am the Dream-Queen. My will,
whatever I desire, becomes. None
can oppose me...$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|It's...all over...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Ugh... Come on! Let's retreat and
buy some time... I'm sure we can
think of a way to escape.$k$pIf we concentrate, I know we can...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|Fruitless. There is no escape.$k$pSurely you realized during our little
battle earlier, did you not?$k$pI can create any nightmare I please
as many times as I please...$k$pYou live because I allow it.$k$pYou live for my amusement.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Where is the fun in allowing you
such an easy, painless end.$k$pSurely thieves who sought to steal
my brother's heart deserve a proper
amount of punishment...$k$pNow, run along... And keep running.
Do try not to lose yourselves in the
endless twisting nightmare...$k$pStruggle. Claw at the corners of your
mind in search of ways to leave my
realm with your lives intact.$k$pHow long until the utter hopelessness
of your situation becomes clear...$k$p$Sbs150|
